verses.verse: He that is wounded in the stones <WH6481> <WH8803> <WH1795>, or hath his privy member <WH8212> cut off <WH3772> <WH8803>, shall not enter <WH935> <WH8799> into the congregation <WH6951> of the YY <WH3068>.

A bastard <WH4464> shall not enter <WH935> <WH8799> into the congregation <WH6951> of the YY <WH3068>; even to his tenth <WH6224> generation <WH1755> shall he not enter <WH935> <WH8799> into the congregation <WH6951> of the YY <WH3068>.

An Ammonite <WH5984> or Moabite <WH4125> shall not enter <WH935> <WH8799> into the congregation <WH6951> of the YY <WH3068>; even to their tenth <WH6224> generation <WH1755> shall they not enter <WH935> <WH8799> into the congregation <WH6951> of the YY <WH3068> for <WH5704> ever <WH5769>:

Because <WH1697> they met <WH6923> <WH8765> you not with bread <WH3899> and with water <WH4325> in the way <WH1870>, when ye came forth <WH3318> <WH8800> out of Egypt <WH4714>; and because they hired <WH7936> <WH8804> against thee Balaam <WH1109> the son <WH1121> of Beor <WH1160> of Pethor <WH6604> of Mesopotamia <WH763>, to curse <WH7043> <WH8763> thee.

Nevertheless the YY <WH3068> thy 'Elohim <WH430> would <WH14> <WH8804> not hearken <WH8085> <WH8800> unto Balaam <WH1109>; but the YY <WH3068> thy 'Elohim <WH430> turned <WH2015> <WH8799> the curse <WH7045> into a b'rakhah <WH1293> unto thee, because the YY <WH3068> thy 'Elohim <WH430> loved <WH157> <WH8804> thee.
Thou shalt not seek <WH1875> <WH8799> their peace <WH7965> nor their prosperity <WH2896> all thy days <WH3117> for ever <WH5769>.

Thou shalt not abhor <WH8581> <WH8762> an Edomite <WH130>; for he is thy brother <WH251>: thou shalt not abhor <WH8581> <WH8762> an Egyptian <WH4713>; because thou wast a stranger <WH1616> in his land <WH776>.
The children <WH1121> that are begotten <WH3205> <WH8735> of them shall enter <WH935> <WH8799> into the congregation <WH6951> of the YY <WH3068> in their third <WH7992> generation <WH1755>.
When the host <WH4264> goeth forth <WH3318> <WH8799> against thine enemies <WH341> <WH8802>, then keep <WH8104> <WH8738> thee from every wicked <WH7451> thing <WH1697>.

If there be among you any man <WH376>, that is not clean <WH2889> by reason of uncleanness that chanceth <WH7137> him by night <WH3915>, then shall he go <WH3318> <WH8804> abroad <WH2351> out of the camp <WH4264>, he shall not come <WH935> <WH8799> within <WH8432> the camp <WH4264>:

But it shall be, when evening <WH6153> cometh on <WH6437> <WH8800>, he shall wash <WH7364> <WH8799> himself with water <WH4325>: and when the sun <WH8121> is down <WH935> <WH8800>, he shall come <WH935> <WH8799> into <WH8432> the camp <WH4264> again.
Thou shalt have a place also <WH3027> without <WH2351> the camp <WH4264>, whither thou shalt go forth <WH3318> <WH8804> abroad <WH2351>:

And thou shalt have a paddle <WH3489> upon thy weapon <WH240>; and it shall be, when thou wilt ease <WH3427> <WH8800> thyself abroad <WH2351>, thou shalt dig <WH2658> <WH8804> therewith, and shalt turn back <WH7725> <WH8804> and cover <WH3680> <WH8765> that which cometh <WH6627> from thee:

For the YY <WH3068> thy 'Elohim <WH430> walketh <WH1980> <WH8693> in the midst <WH7130> of thy camp <WH4264>, to deliver <WH5337> <WH8687> thee, and to give up <WH5414> <WH8800> thine enemies <WH341> <WH8802> before <WH6440> thee; therefore shall thy camp <WH4264> be holy <WH6918>: that he see <WH7200> <WH8799> no unclean <WH6172> thing <WH1697> in thee, and turn away <WH7725> <WH8804> from thee <WH310>.
Thou shalt not deliver <WH5462> <WH8686> unto his master <WH113> the servant <WH5650> which is escaped <WH5337> <WH8735> from his master <WH113> unto thee:

He shall dwell <WH3427> <WH8799> with thee, even among <WH7130> you, in that place <WH4725> which he shall choose <WH977> <WH8799> in one <WH259> of thy gates <WH8179>, where it liketh him best <WH2896>: thou shalt not oppress <WH3238> <WH8686> him.
There shall be no whore <WH6948> of the daughters <WH1323> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>, nor a sodomite <WH6945> of the sons <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>.

Thou shalt not bring <WH935> <WH8686> the hire <WH868> of a whore <WH2181> <WH8802>, or the price <WH4242> of a dog <WH3611>, into the house <WH1004> of the YY <WH3068> thy 'Elohim <WH430> for any vow <WH5088>: for even both <WH8147> these are abomination <WH8441> unto the YY <WH3068> thy 'Elohim <WH430>.

Thou shalt not lend upon usury <WH5391> <WH8686> to thy brother <WH251>; usury <WH5392> of money <WH3701>, usury <WH5392> of victuals <WH400>, usury <WH5392> of any thing <WH1697> that is lent upon usury <WH5391> <WH8799>:

Unto a stranger <WH5237> thou mayest lend upon usury <WH5391> <WH8686>; but unto thy brother <WH251> thou shalt not lend upon usury <WH5391> <WH8686>: that the YY <WH3068> thy 'Elohim <WH430> may bless <WH1288> <WH8762> thee in all that thou settest <WH4916> thine hand <WH3027> to in the land <WH776> whither thou goest <WH935> <WH8802> to possess <WH3423> <WH8800> it.

When thou shalt vow <WH5087> <WH8799> a vow <WH5088> unto the YY <WH3068> thy 'Elohim <WH430>, thou shalt not slack <WH309> <WH8762> to pay <WH7999> <WH8763> it: for the YY <WH3068> thy 'Elohim <WH430> will surely <WH1875> <WH8800> require <WH1875> <WH8799> it of thee; and it would be sin <WH2399> in thee.
But if thou shalt forbear <WH2308> <WH8799> to vow <WH5087> <WH8800>, it shall be no sin <WH2399> in thee.

That which is gone out <WH4161> of thy lips <WH8193> thou shalt keep <WH8104> <WH8799> and perform <WH6213> <WH8804>; even a freewill offering <WH5071>, according as thou hast vowed <WH5087> <WH8804> unto the YY <WH3068> thy 'Elohim <WH430>, which thou hast promised <WH1696> <WH8765> with thy mouth <WH6310>.

When thou comest <WH935> <WH8799> into thy neighbour's <WH7453> vineyard <WH3754>, then thou mayest eat <WH398> <WH8804> grapes <WH6025> thy fill <WH7648> at thine own pleasure <WH5315>; but thou shalt not put <WH5414> <WH8799> any in thy vessel <WH3627>.

When thou comest <WH935> <WH8799> into the standing corn <WH7054> of thy neighbour <WH7453>, then thou mayest pluck <WH6998> <WH8804> the ears <WH4425> with thine hand <WH3027>; but thou shalt not move <WH5130> <WH8686> a sickle <WH2770> unto thy neighbour's <WH7453> standing corn <WH7054>.
